attributes.action: legislate for a ban on killing healthy animals in British Animal Shelters / dog pounds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Every year thousands of healthy animals are killed (put to sleep) in UK animal shelters and dog pounds after they have served their 7 days after being handed in or caught.  

There is no national database of unwanted or homeless animals to help owners locate their missing pets.  

Council policies of whether to kill healthy animals are made on a local basis and there is no national agreed consensus. 

Killing healthy animals who are waiting for a home is wrong and should be banned.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/animalpounds/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
